features: Wearable full-length blanket/poncho hybrid for use while camping, backpacking, hiking, or adventuring outdoors in colder weather
Double layer 100g polyester insulation is warm, light, packable, insulation and polyester shell fabric made from 100% recycled materials
Gusseted neck opening for wear as a poncho to walk around freely with blanket on, snap-away adjustable hem keeps it out of the dirt
Stows in included stuff sack for compact transport, machine washable for easy care
Backed by a 5 year manufacturer’s warranty
